userStories.title: Ghostty terminal opens frozen/unresponsive when starting ticket
userStories.description:
## Problem
When clicking "Start Work" on a ticket, Ghostty opens but the terminal is completely frozen:
- No shell prompt appears
- Typing commands (like `ls`) shows characters but nothing executes
- The terminal is unresponsive to all input
- Window title shows "Ghostty" but no shell session is active

## Expected Behavior
Terminal should open with:
1. Shell prompt visible
2. Working directory set to project path
3. Claude Code launched with ticket context
4. Interactive terminal session

## Root Cause (Suspected)
The Ghostty launch command syntax may be incorrect. Current command:
```
ghostty --working-directory="${projectPath}" -e bash -c '${claudeCommand}; exec bash'
```

Ghostty may not support the `-e` flag the same way other terminals do, or the command escaping is breaking the shell execution.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Terminal opens with visible shell prompt
- [ ] Working directory is correct
- [ ] Claude Code launches with context
- [ ] Terminal remains interactive after Claude exits

## Technical Notes
- File: `src/api/terminal.ts`
- Function: `buildTerminalCommand()` case for "ghostty"
- Need to verify Ghostty's CLI syntax for running commands
acceptance_criteria: Terminal opens with visible shell prompt
Terminal remains interactive after Claude exits
